title: Question on PBE ...
body: Hello, I am a player from Brazil and I wanted to have an account on PBE, only level up EVERYTHING from scratch is very tiring (I am now level 30 in my original account), so I wanted to know that even though I was lvl 6 yet (game daily that account), I could be accepted in PBE. Thank you. {{champion:157}}

replies.body: I'm not familiar with how the PBE works for your main region.  I do see that you have an NA account, which will allow you to[ sign up](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Unfortunately, I don't have any details on how to get accepted to the PBE beyond what's in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
Thank you so much, but i have a final question: when i select "sign up", an error page shows up (Error: 500). Is there anything I can do to remove the error?
